summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: Event structure for the MFP_EVENT_TYPE_MEDIAITEM_CREATED event. This event is sent when the or method completes.

member.name: MFP_MEDIAITEM_CREATED_EVENT.header
member.summary: structure that contains data common to all events.

member.name: MFP_MEDIAITEM_CREATED_EVENT.pMediaItem
member.summary: Pointer to the interface of the new media item. If creating the media item failed, this member is NULL.

member.name: MFP_MEDIAITEM_CREATED_EVENT.dwUserData
member.summary: Application-defined user data for the media item. This value is specified when the application calls or .
